item.title: deconvolution
item.description: iterated conditional mode algorithm two components: epithelium-derived tumor cells and surrounding stromal cells tumor cells,immune cells and the tumor microenvironment. estimate the proportions and compartment-specific gene expression for more than two compartments in each tumor sample ISOpure: assumes a linear mixture of raw expression data and represents noncancerous profiles in the mixed tissue samples by a convex combination of all the available profiles from reference sample $$ Y_{ig}=\pi_{1,i}N_{1,ig}+\pi_{2,i}N{2,ig}+(1-\pi_{1,i}-\pi_{2,i})T{ig} $$

item.title: hugo显示数学公式
item.description: 问题描述 用hugo生成的静态网页中的公式显示不出来，无论是 inline （行内公式）的还是 display style（行间公式）。如下面所示： this is a test inline expression, $x_1+x2=1$ , and the display expression is as following: $$ Y{ig}=\pi{1,i}N{1,ig}+\pi{2,i}N{2,ig}+(1-\pi{1,i}-\pi{2,i})T_{ig} $$ which both fail to show properly. 经过一番google，找到了一些解决办法，我随便挑了一个很多人都提到的方法，通过mathjax。 成功示例： This is a inline expresion: $Y_{ig}=\pi_{1,i}N_{1,ig}+\pi_{2,i}N_{2,ig}+(1-\pi_{1,i}-\pi_{2,i})T_{ig}$, while this is a display expression: $$Y_{ig}=\pi_{1,i}N_{1,ig}+\pi_{2,i}N_{2,ig}+(1-\pi_{1,i}-\pi_{2,i})T_{ig}$$ 解决步骤 将 ./themes/theme-name/layouts/ 文件夹里的东西全都拷到 ./layouts/ 下面。 在 ./layouts/partials/ 创建一个html文件。命名为 mathjax_support.html 将下面一段代码写入mathjax_support.html <script type="text/javascript" async src="https://cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML"> MathJax.Hub.Config({ tex2jax: { inlineMath: [['$','$'], ['\\(','\\)']], displayMath: [['$$','$$']], processEscapes: true, processEnvironments: true, skipTags: ['script', 'noscript', 'style', 'textarea', 'pre'], TeX: { equationNumbers: { autoNumber: "AMS" }, extensions: ["AMSmath.
